These fixtures are copied from the upstream **Open-Xml-PowerTools** repository to smoke-test DOCX → HTML conversion across a broad corpus.

- Upstream: https://github.com/OpenXmlDev/Open-Xml-PowerTools
- Source path (developer machine): `/Users/rdewolff/Projects/Open-Xml-PowerTools`
- License: MIT (see upstream notices and full license text in this repo’s `NOTICE.md`).

If you update the upstream repo locally, re-sync fixtures into this folder by copying the upstream DOCX files.
